short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your 1688.com orders! Capture product details and create orders on Synced Logistics for China-to-Philippines shipping.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1688-Synced Logistics PH is here to make your life easier! This extension seamlessly integrates 1688.com with Synced Logistic, allowing you to create orders with just a few clicks.

Key Features:

One-Click Product Capture: When you're on a 1688.com product page, the extension automatically detects and extracts key details like:

Product Name
Price
Specifications (size, color, etc.)
Images

Instant Order Creation: With the captured product information, you can instantly create an order directly on Synced Logistic without switching tabs or manually entering data.

Auto-Fill Order Forms: The extension intelligently pre-fills the order creation form on your logistics platform with the extracted product information, saving you time and effort.

Streamlined Workflow: Manage all your orders from China to the Philippines efficiently through the Synced Logistic dashboard, with real-time status updates and tracking.

Secure and Reliable: Your data is securely transmitted to Synced Logistic, ensuring a safe and reliable ordering experience.

Built for Synced Logistic Users: This extension is specifically designed for customers of Synced Logistic who frequently purchase from 1688.com and require shipping services from China to the Philippines.

How it Works:

Install the 1688-Synced Logistics PH from the Chrome Web Store.

Browse 1688.com and find the products you want to order.

Click the designated button on the product page to capture product details.

The order will be directly submitted to Synced Logistic.

Benefits:

Save Time: Eliminate manual data entry and streamline your ordering process.

Reduce Errors: Avoid mistakes that can occur when manually copying product details.

Increase Efficiency: Manage your orders more effectively with a seamless integration.

Enjoy a Smoother Experience: Focus on finding the best products on 1688.com, knowing that ordering is just a click away.

Get Started Today!

Download the 1688-Synced Logistics PH and experience the future of simplified logistics.

Note: This extension requires an active account with Synced Logistic.

Permissions:

This extension requires permission to access data on 1688.com to capture product details. Your data privacy is our priority and we only use these permissions for the functionality described above.

Support:

For any questions or assistance, please contact us through Synced Logistic's support channels.
